introduction.para: drafts for new features can be written below and then copied out when they release.

TD.para: LINK TO MSETS QUERY: Feb Fork - Mar Updateshttps://msets.visualstudio.com/DefaultCollection/Office/_queries?tempQueryId=ff6f57c4-52c8-429b-960c-6c6b2656c509

nonEmptyContent.para: We've turbo-charged your VLOOKUP, HLOOKUP, and MATCH calculations so you can get answers faster.
Translate words, phrases or sentences to another language with Microsoft Translator. You can do this from the Review tab in the ribbon.

para.legacyBold: [23934] https://msets.visualstudio.com/DefaultCollection/Office/_workItems/index?id=23934&_a=editIn Tell Me in Excel, I can find my documents and people that will enable me to accomplish my tasks in Office.

nonEmptyContent.para: New feature B description here...

para.legacyBold: [12588] https://msets.visualstudio.com/DefaultCollection/Office/_workItems/index?id=12588&_a=editModern Arrays - Make arrays easier to work with by removing need to CTRL+Shift+Enter and set output range sizes, plus add functions that work better with arrays

nonEmptyContent.para: New feature A description here...

para.legacyBold: [15292] https://msets.visualstudio.com/DefaultCollection/Office/_workItems/index?id=15292&_a=editSatori in a Cell - Allow users to land Satori (Bing) objects in the grid, view the contents in a card, refresh data, and extract values to the grid

nonEmptyContent.para: New feature B description here...

para.legacyBold: [6700] https://msets.visualstudio.com/DefaultCollection/Office/_workItems/index?id=6700&_a=editDesktop: Formulas: Easier to use Array Functions (e.g. no longer predefine output ranges, no more ctrl+shift+enter, etc)

nonEmptyContent.para: New feature A description here...

para.legacyBold: [8455] https://msets.visualstudio.com/DefaultCollection/Office/_workItems/index?id=8455&_a=editDesktop: JavaScript custom functions that enable calculation, web service invocation, async execution

nonEmptyContent.para: New feature B description here...

content.para: Armelle, here's my draft of when these features may have shipped. I left the link to the VSO items in there so that when we get descriptions, they'll be easy to pull in. All the LEARN MORE links just go to the XL Online TOC for now. I'm not sure each of them will have a supporting article, but the placeholder (with a comment in the file) is there for now.

gridColumn.title: Latest updates for Excel for Windows Desktop

nonEmptyContent.para: See what's new and improved in the [MONTH] 2017 feature update, Version 17xx (Build 8xxx.xxxx). Find your Office version.
Keep reading to see what's new in Version 17xx (Build 8xxx.xxxx) for Insider Slow then tell us what you think. Your early feedback is invaluable, so keep it coming!
